   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(openssl_server_cert_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_group/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2
   36:         ]).
   37: 
   38: 
   39: %% Test cases
   40: -export([no_auth/0,
   41:          no_auth/1,
   42:          auth/0,
   43:          auth/1,
   44:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   45:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   46:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   47:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
   48:          client_auth_partial_chain/0,
   49:          client_auth_partial_chain/1,
   50:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/0,
   51:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/1,
   52:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/0,
   53:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/1,
   54:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/0,
   55:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/1,
   56:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/0,
   57:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/1,
   58:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/0,
   59:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/1,
   60:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/0,
   61:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/1,
   62:          hello_retry_request/0,
   63:          hello_retry_request/1,
   64:          custom_groups/0,
   65:          custom_groups/1,
   66:          hello_retry_client_auth/0,
   67:          hello_retry_client_auth/1,
   68:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   69:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   70:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   71:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1
   72:         ]).
   73: 
   74: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   75: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   76: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   77: all() ->
   78:     [
   79:      {group,  openssl_server}].
   80: 
   81: groups() ->
   82:     [
   83:      {openssl_server, [], protocol_groups()},
   84:      {'tlsv1.3', [], tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   85:      {'tlsv1.2', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   86:      {'tlsv1.1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   87:      {'tlsv1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   88:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   89:      {'dtlsv1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   90:      {rsa, [], all_version_tests()},
   91:      {ecdsa, [], all_version_tests()},
   92:      {dsa, [], all_version_tests()},
   93:      {rsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
   94:       %% TODO: Create proper conf of openssl server
   95:       %%++ [unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
   96:       %% unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth]},
   97:      {rsa_pss_rsae, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
   98:      {rsa_pss_pss, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
   99:      {ecdsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()}
  100:      %% Enable test later when we have OpenSSL version that
  101:      %% is able to read EDDSA private key files
  102:      %%{eddsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()}
  103:     ].
  104: 
  105: protocol_groups() ->
  106:     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of
  107:         true ->
  108:             [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  109:              {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  110:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  111:              {group, 'tlsv1'},
  112:              {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  113:              {group, 'dtlsv1'}];
  114:         false ->
  115:             [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  116:              {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  117:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  118:              {group, 'tlsv1'}
  119:             ]
  120:     end.
  121: 
  122: pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  123:     [{group, rsa},
  124:      {group, ecdsa},
  125:      {group, dsa}].
  126: 
  127: tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  128:     [{group, rsa_1_3},
  129:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae},
  130:      {group, rsa_pss_pss},
  131:      {group, ecdsa_1_3}
  132:      %%{group, eddsa_1_3}
  133:     ].
  134: 
  135: tls_1_3_tests() ->
  136:     [
  137:      hello_retry_request,
  138:      custom_groups,
  139:      hello_retry_client_auth,
  140:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  141:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected
  142:     ].
  143: 
  144: all_version_tests() ->
  145:     [
  146:      no_auth,
  147:      auth,
  148:      missing_root_cert_no_auth
  149:     ].
  150: 
  151: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  152:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config, openssl).
  153: 
  154: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  155:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
  156: 
  157: init_per_group(openssl_server, Config0) ->
  158:     Config = proplists:delete(server_type, proplists:delete(client_type, Config0)),
  159:     [{client_type, erlang}, {server_type, openssl} | Config];
  160: init_per_group(rsa = Group, Config0) ->
  161:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  162:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  163:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  164:     %% Make sure _rsa* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  165:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  166:     Ciphers = ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(dhe_rsa) ->
  167:                                                   true;
  168:                                              (ecdhe_rsa) ->
  169:                                                   true;
  170:                                              (_) ->
  171:                                                   false
  172:                                           end, Version),
  173:     case Ciphers of
  174:         [_|_] ->
  175:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa} |
  176:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  177:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts] end},
  178:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  179:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  180:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  181:         [] ->
  182:             {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  183:     end;
  184: init_per_group(rsa_1_3 = Group, Config0) ->
  185:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  186:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  187:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  188:     %% Make sure _rsa* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  189:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  190:     Ciphers = ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(undefined, Version),
  191:     case Ciphers of
  192:         [_|_] ->
  193:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa} |
  194:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  195:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts] end},
  196:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  197:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  198:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  199:         [] ->
  200:             {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  201:     end;
  202: init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae;
  203:                                  Alg == rsa_pss_pss ->
  204:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  205:     RSAOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(rsa_opts, Supports),
  206: 
  207:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts)
  208:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts)
  209:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts)
  210:         andalso ssl_test_lib:is_sane_oppenssl_pss(Alg)
  211:     of
  212:         true ->
  213:             #{client_config := COpts,
  214:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(Alg, [], Config, ""),
  215:             [{cert_key_alg, Alg} |
  216:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  217:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  218:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  219:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  220:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  221:         false ->
  222:             {skip, "Missing crypto or OpenSSL support"}
  223:     end;
  224: init_per_group(ecdsa = Group, Config0) ->
  225:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  226:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse
  227:                                                 lists:member(dh, PKAlg))
  228:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:openssl_ecdsa_suites() =/= [])
  229:     of
  230:         true ->
  231:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  232:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  233:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  234:             %% Make sure ecdh* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  235:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  236:             Ciphers =  ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(ecdh_ecdsa) ->
  237:                                                            true;
  238:                                                       (ecdhe_ecdsa) ->
  239:                                                            true;
  240:                                                       (_) ->
  241:                                                            false
  242:                                                    end, Version),
  243:             case Ciphers of
  244:                 [_|_] ->
  245:                     [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  246:                      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  247:                                   [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts] end},
  248:                                    {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  249:                                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  250:                                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  251:                                  )];
  252:                         [] ->
  253:                     {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  254:             end;
  255:         false ->
  256:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  257:     end;
  258: init_per_group(ecdsa_1_3 = Group, Config0) ->
  259:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  260:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse
  261:                                              lists:member(dh, PKAlg))
  262:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:openssl_ecdsa_suites() =/= [])
  263:     of
  264:         true ->
  265:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  266:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  267:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  268:             %% Make sure ecdh* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  269:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  270:             Ciphers =  ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(undefined, Version),
  271:             case Ciphers of
  272:                 [_|_] ->
  273:                     [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  274:                      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  275:                                   [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts] end},
  276:                                    {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  277:                                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  278:                                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  279:                                  )];
  280:                         [] ->
  281:                     {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  282:             end;
  283:         false ->
  284:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  285:     end;
  286: 
  287: init_per_group(eddsa_1_3, Config0) ->
  288:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  289:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0),
  290:     case lists:member(eddsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg)) of
  291:         true ->
  292:             Conf = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  293:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  294:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
  295:                                                client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  296:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  297:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}),
  298:             [{server_config, SOpts},
  299:              {client_config, COpts}] = x509_test:gen_pem_config_files(Conf, filename:join(PrivDir, "client_eddsa"),
  300:                                                                       filename:join(PrivDir, "server_eddsa")),
  301: 
  302:             [{cert_key_alg, eddsa} |
  303:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  304:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  305:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  306:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  307:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config0))]
  308:                          )];
  309:         false ->
  310:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  311:     end;
  312: init_per_group(dsa = Group, Config0) ->
  313:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  314:     case lists:member(dss, PKAlg) andalso lists:member(dh, PKAlg) andalso
  315:         (ssl_test_lib:openssl_dsa_suites() =/= [])
  316:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:check_sane_openssl_dsa(Config0))
  317:     of
  318:         true ->
  319:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_dsa_cert(Config0),
  320:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_dsa_opts, Config),
  321:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_dsa_opts, Config),
  322:             %% Make sure dhe_dss* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  323:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  324:             Ciphers =  ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(dh_dss) ->
  325:                                                            true;
  326:                                                       (dhe_dss) ->
  327:                                                            true;
  328:                                                       (_) ->
  329:                                                            false
  330:                                                    end, Version),
  331:             case Ciphers of
  332:                 [_|_] ->
  333:                     [{cert_key_alg, dsa} |
  334:                      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  335:                                   [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts]  ++
  336:                                                                    ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(dsa, Version)
  337:                                                       end},
  338:                                    {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  339:                                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  340:                                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  341:                 [] ->
  342:                     {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  343:             end;
  344:         false ->
  345:             {skip, "Missing DSS crypto support"}
  346:     end;
  347: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  348:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  349:         true  ->
  350:             case ssl_test_lib:check_sane_openssl_version(GroupName, Config) of
  351:                 true ->
  352:                     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config);
  353:                 false  ->
  354:                     {skip, {atom_to_list(GroupName) ++ " not supported by OpenSSL"}}
  355:             end;
  356:         false ->
  357:             Config
  358:     end.
  359: 
  360: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  361:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  362: 
  363: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  364:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  365:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  366:     Config.
  367: 
  368: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  369:     Config.
  370: 
  371: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  372: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  373: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  374: 
  375: no_auth() ->
  376:      ssl_cert_tests:no_auth().
  377: 
  378: no_auth(Config) ->
  379:       ssl_cert_tests:no_auth(Config).
  380: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  381: auth() ->
  382:     ssl_cert_tests:auth().
  383: auth(Config) ->
  384:     ssl_cert_tests:auth(Config).
  385: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  386: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  387:      ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().
  388: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
  389:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config).
  390: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  391: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
  392:       ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected().
  393: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
  394:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config).
  395: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  396: client_auth_partial_chain() ->
  397:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_partial_chain().
  398: client_auth_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  399:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_partial_chain(Config).
  400: 
  401: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  402: client_auth_use_partial_chain() ->
  403:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_use_partial_chain().
  404: client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  405:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config).
  406: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  407: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain() ->
  408:    ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain().
  409: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  410:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config).
  411: 
  412: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  413: client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail() ->
  414:    ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail().
  415: client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  416:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail(Config).
  417: 
  418: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  419: missing_root_cert_no_auth() ->
  420:    ssl_cert_tests:missing_root_cert_no_auth().
  421: missing_root_cert_no_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  422:     ssl_cert_tests:missing_root_cert_no_auth(Config).
  423: 
  424: 
  425: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  426: %% TLS 1.3 Test Cases ------------------------------------------------
  427: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  428: hello_retry_request() ->
  429:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_request().
  430: hello_retry_request(Config) ->
  431:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_request(Config).
  432: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  433: custom_groups() ->
  434:     ssl_cert_tests:custom_groups().
  435: custom_groups(Config) ->
  436:     ssl_cert_tests:custom_groups(Config).
  437: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth() ->
  438:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth().
  439: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config) ->
  440:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config).
  441: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth() ->
  442:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth().
  443: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config) ->
  444:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config).
  445: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  446: hello_retry_client_auth() ->
  447:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth().
  448: hello_retry_client_auth(Config) ->
  449:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth(Config).
  450: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  451: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  452:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().
  453: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
  454:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config).
  455: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  456: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
  457:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected().
  458: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
  459:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config).
